I'm a young media engineer, passionate about web and technology.

My studies in media engineering have not only allowed me to develop up-to-date technical skills, but also to widen my skills in many media-related fields, such as communication, digital marketing, UX/UI, management or content creation. My particular interest in web development has pushed me, and pushes me, to continuously inform myself about current and future technologies, in order to progress and learn a bit more every day.
